Package presentation

Class ViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • presentation.ViewController
  • public class ViewController
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the User Interface of the program.

      • getUsersDatabase

        public java.util.Collection<User> getUsersDatabase()
        Returns:
        An immutable view on the Users in the database.

      • addLevelDatabase

        public Level addLevelDatabase​(Board board,
                              java.lang.String creator)
        Adds a new Level with the specified creator and board. If a user with name creator does not exist, the level will still be added.
        Parameters:
        board - Board of the level.
        creator - Name of the creator of the level.

      • userHasGameSaved

        public boolean userHasGameSaved​(java.lang.String user)
        Returns:
        true if the User with the specified name has a pending Game.

      • startNewGame

        public Game startNewGame​(java.lang.String user,
                         int levelId)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a new Game with the specified username and level and returns it.

        If the User already had a pending Game, it will be replaced.

        Parameters:
        user - Name of the User.
        levelId - ID of the Level the User will play.
        Returns:
        Returns the created Game.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If a Level with the ID does not exist.

      • continueGame

        public Game continueGame​(java.lang.String user)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        user - Name of the User with a pending Game.
        Returns:
        The User's pending Game
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the specified User does not have a pending Game.

      • saveGame

        public void saveGame​(java.lang.String user,
                     Game game)
        Saves the Game to be continued on the future.
        Parameters:
        game - Game to be saved.
        user - Name of the player of the specified Game.

      • setAsCompleted

        public void setAsCompleted​(Game game,
                           java.lang.String user)
        Adds the Game into the ranking of the Level.
        Parameters:
        game - Completed Game.
        user - Name of the player of the specified Game.

      • importLevel

        public Level importLevel​(java.lang.String path,
                         java.lang.String creator)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Imports a Level from a file in the specified path and saves it into the Database.

        Expects the PROP format: https://www.cs.upc.edu/prop/data/uploads/formatokenken.pdf

        If the path does not exist, or the parsing fails, an exception will be thrown.

        Parameters:
        path - Path where the level is.
        creator - Username of the level's creator.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getLevelsBySize

        public java.util.List<java.util.List<Level>> getLevelsBySize()
        Returns:
        All the Levels ordered by difficulty (size of the Board).

      • loginUser

        public boolean loginUser​(java.lang.String username)
        Logs-in the user with the specified name. If the user does not exist, it creates a new one.
        Returns:
        true if the user did not exist and has been created.

      • persistDatabase

        public void persistDatabase()
        Persists the Database to the default path.
